vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.4;
son of: Shemaiah (H8098D);
father of: Shimei (H8096L)
§ Gog = "mountain"
1) a Reubenite, son of Shemaiah
2) the prophetic prince of Rosh, Meshech and Tubal, and Magog
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   jefe de Mésec y Tubal; (b)   hijo de Semaías; tribu de Rubén
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
歌革 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 「山崗」
1) 流便支派的人, 示瑪雅的兒子 (代上 5:3-4)
2) 預言中羅施、米設、土巴, 與瑪各的王 (結 38:2-3)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
歌革 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 「山岗」
1) 流便支派的人, 示玛雅的儿子 (代上 5:3-4)
2) 预言中罗施、米设、土巴, 与玛各的王 (结 38:2-3)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: Gōg<\i> (Γώγ "Gog" G1136)
§ Gog = "mountain"
This name is used for:
1) a Reubenite, son of Shemaiah
2) the prophetic prince of Rosh, Meshech and Tubal, and Magog
